summary:
Adds a Rapier in the style of a Gallowglass sword to the game. Built from scratch custom meshes and high rez textures.

Craft at any forge under Steel. Temper, enchant, Enjoy :)
descriptionHtml:
What is this mod?

Adds a Rapier in the style of a Gallowglass sword to the game. Built from scratch custom meshes and high rez textures.

Craft at any forge under Steel. Temper, enchant, Enjoy :)
=======================================================================================

[youtube]xh_8Y1n5Vo8[/youtube] [youtube]Rf-myh4t1P8[/youtube]

[youtube]tHckF-LgOyY[/youtube]

Huge thanks to dptheslothking, Nozi87 and Triggerhappy115/PrestigeEagle for the showcases. PLEASE check out there channels and support when you can. :)

=======================================================================================

Basically a steel sword but lighter, as fast as a dagger and with the reach of a 2 handed sword at the cost of a point of damage.

Crafting as vanilla steel sword.

Weight:7.5
Reach:1.3
Speed:1.3
Damage:7

If you just want to try it out you can console it in with...

Help Gallowglass 4

Player.additem XX 000D62 1

in the console.

In game shots by the hugely talented Nightskia using his follower Aeja Deersong

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1631771/?

Thanks my friend as always ;)

The armour Nightskia used is the Scarlet Dawn Armour by the ridiculously talented jmaneru/bloodfree.

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50814/?

Rarely agree with the guy but ALWAYS agree his stuff is the bomb ;)

======================================================================
Big, big thanks to:

Frank Family
Serindas
cashmoney111
CaBal 120
my main man Nightskia (love ya dude!)
Shinji72
dptheslothking

and everyone else who has been supporting, encouraging and helping me far more then I deserve over the past few months. Would have quit long ago without you guys, can't thank you enough.

Standalone09 mate you don't get a thank you, you've gotten far too good for my liking these days big man. Bad medicine, chief kettlewitch no like.... ;)

Special big thanks to Phnx for the dual sheath patch. First one ever for one of my mods :)

=======================================================================
INSTALLATION

Click the Download with Manager button in the files section to download to NMM.
Activate the mod in NMM.

To manually install, just download the file and extract the files into the data folder. Don't forget to activate the .esp ;)

=======================================================================
author: KettleWitch
